PERFORMANCE

REFINED PERFORMANCE TO TAKE YOU

NEARLY ANYWHERE

Find more possibilities, no matter where you go. With the spirited CX-50, you can take its capable, connected handling both
on and off the road. 

2025 Mazda CX-50 2.5 Turbo Meridian Edition with Apex Package and options shown. Available Summer 2024.

EMPOWERING i-ACTIV AWD ® COMES STANDARD

Mazda Intelligent Drive Select (Mi-Drive) allows you to choose different drive modes to best suit your
driving situation. Combined with our i-Activ AWD® and powerful engine options, it provides Mazda
signature driving dynamics for nearly any terrain or road you’re on. 4

Mi-Drive

Mazda Intelligent Drive Select (Mi-Drive)technology allows you to
instantly choose from different drive modes, so your connection to
the road stays natural and intuitive across a wide variety of driving
scenarios.

Drive Modes

Choose from Normal Mode for an ideal balance of performance and
efficiency, Sport Mode for more responsiveness, Off-Road Mode for
maximum traction or available Towing Mode.5

Towing Mode

Available on CX-50 2.5 Turbo models, Towing Mode helps keep the
CX-50 stable while hauling up to 3,500 lbs. 2


SHOP ACCESSORIES

INTERESTED IN A HYBRID CX-50?

A new, hybrid version built with your adventures in mind will be available
soon. Offering up to 219 hp total and up to an EPA-estimated 38 combined
city/highway mpg,6 the Mazda CX-50 Hybrid will feature a new on-
demand e-AWD system and three different trim levels.

CAR AND DRIVER PRAISES THE 2024 MAZDA CX-50

With a "solid powertrain" and its "plush, high-quality interior," Car and Driver magazine named the CX-50 the compact SUV "we most wanted to drive and live with."

LEARN MORE
DESIGN

ENGINEERED FOR CAPABILITY

Every detail of the CX-50 is imbued with your life and your passions in mind.

PREMIUM INTERIOR

Our durable interior features are shaped for a comfortable and relaxed drive, with
every control and panel within reach and designed around your line of sight so you
can stay focused on the road ahead.

AVAILABLE PANORAMIC MOONROOF

Whether it's cascading moonlight or the green dappled canvas of a forest ceiling,
your moments in nature can last longer through the available Panoramic
Moonroof

UTILITY FOR ANY ACTIVITY

and premium stitching to

Aero Gray Color

The graceful powerful form of this
vehicle is accentuated by the new
Aero Gray exterior color, available
for the CX-30.

Available Turbo Model

CX-30 2.5 Turbo models feature eye-catching accents
including a Black accented grille and durable Black
roof rails for more cargo carrying options.

REFINED DESIGN

The powerful aesthetic of the CX-50 fuses strength and dynamism
with meticulous detailing for a vibrant utility that calls you to
explore your environment.

A SEAMLESS DRIVE

Whether you're running errands or on an adventure, stay connected and drive with convenience.

SAFETY

DRIVE WITH A SENSE OF SECURITY

With the i-Activsense ® suite of safety features, sophisticated safety innovations alert you to hazards to help you avoid collisions
or lessen their impact.

2024 IIHS TOP SAFETY PICK+

We’re proud that the 2024 Mazda CX-50 (built after August 2023) has won a IIHS TOP SAFETY PICK+ award—so you can drive with control, safety, and confidence.

STAY FOCUSED WITH i-ACTIVSENSE ® SAFETY TECHNOLOGY

1/9

Adaptive Front-Lighting System

This available feature can pivot the headlights in the direction the steering wheel is being
turned, increasing the range of the headlights, improving visibility and making it easier to
spot potential hazards.. 12
